name: HellBeastz
description:
!This is a demo version, a lot of thing is missing!

- The name of the game is not certain either -

- Sound is from HL2 and they are just placeholders -

is a fast paced top-down shooter with cycling weapons and telekinesis

You are a dog from hell in an arena, fighting bandits and other scum.

You will face intense challanges. How far can you get?

Slay bandits in this satisfying, fast paced, gunz blazing, shoot 'em up in unique ways

Controls

WASD to move
Left Mouse to shoot
HOLD Right Mouse to pickup/move items and objects
Space to throw weapon
Q to bark (not impl. yet)
